text: Tumne un logon ko bhi dekha jinse kaha gaya tha ke apne haath rokey rakkho aur namaz qayam karo aur zakat do? Ab jo unhein ladayi ka hukum diya gaya to unmein se ek fareeq ka haal yeh hai ke logon se aisa darr rahey hain jaisa khuda se darna chahiye ya kuch issey bhi badhkar. Kehte hain khudaya! Yeh humpar ladayi ka hukum kyun likh diya? Kyun na humein abhi kuch aur mohlat di? Unse kaho, duniya ka sarmaya e zindagi thoda hai, aur aakhirat ek khuda-tars Insan ke liye zyada behtar hai, aur tumpar zulm ek shamma (husk of a date-stone) barabar bhi ba kiya jayega
